definitions.definition: One engaged in politics , especially an elected or appointed government official.
examples: Politicians should serve the country's interest.

definitions.definition: Specifically, one who regards elected political office as a career .
examples: Unlike the other candidates, I'm not a politician .

definitions.definition: A politically active or interested person.
examples: Only real politicians are interested in this issue.
There is a politician in every office.

main_definition: One engaged in politics , especially an elected or appointed government official.
secondary_definitions: Specifically, one who regards elected political office as a career .
A politically active or interested person.
